price: Enyi mlio amini! Mcheni Mwenyezi Mungu, na kuweni pamoja na wakweli.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَكُونُواْ مَعَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
footnotes: Enyi mlio amini! Simameni imara baraabara juu ya uchamungu na Imani. Na kuweni pamoja na wale walio wakweli katika kauli yao na vitendo vyao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ittaqū al-laha wakūnū maʿa al-ṣādiqīna
